title: Make Safe Harbor Estimated Tax Payment
description: To avoid underpayment penalties, a taxpayer wants to make estimated tax payments based on the prior year's tax liability (safe harbor rule).

tasks.description: Retrieve the total tax liability from the taxpayer's prior year tax return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the total tax from last year's Form 1040.

tasks.description: Determine the required annual payment based on the safe harbor rule (e.g., 100% or 110% of prior year tax).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the total amount that must be paid for the current year.

tasks.description: Divide the total required payment by four and advise the client of the quarterly payment amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the client with the exact amount to pay each quarter.
